imdb.plot outline: PAST IS PROLOGUE is the prequel web series to Cristin Terrill's YA time travel novel ALL OUR YESTERDAYS, coming from Disney-Hyperion on 9/03/13. Meet Em and Finn, two imprisoned teens who are keeping a secret from the man they call only "the doctor" in this story that takes place in the days leading up to the beginning of the novel.

synopsis: PAST IS PROLOGUE is the prequel web series to Cristin Terrill's YA time travel novel ALL OUR YESTERDAYS, coming from Disney-Hyperion on 9/03/13. Meet Em and Finn, two imprisoned teens who are keeping a secret from the man they call only "the doctor" in this story that takes place in the days leading up to the beginning of the novel.
